org.sd.text.segment
Class Segment

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.text.segment.Segment

public class Segment
extends java.lang.Object

Container class for text 'segments' associated with boolean feature computations whose results for the text are cached in this class.

Author:
Spence Koehler

Constructor Summary
Segment(FeatureBag featureBag, java.lang.String text)
          Construct a segment with the feature bag and text.
Segment(java.lang.String text)
          Construt a segment with an empty feature bag and the given text.
 
Method Summary
 void addFeature(BooleanFeatureComputation bfc)
          Add the feature to this segment's feature bag.
 void append(Segment other)
          Append the other segment to this one, discarding the other's features while keeping this segment's features.

          Append the text to the end of this segment's text, resetting all features.

hasFeature

public boolean hasFeature(java.lang.String feature,
                          java.lang.Boolean value)
Determine whether this segment's computation of the feature equals the value.

Note that a manual feature is not considered if it has not been set and the result will be false regardless of the value, but all feature computations will be executed as needed.

Returns:
true if the value matches the feature's value; otherwise, false.

getFeature

public java.lang.Boolean getFeature(java.lang.String feature)
Get the computed value for the given feature over this segment's text.

Returns:
the computed boolean feature.

split

public SegmentSequence split(java.lang.String feature)
Split this segment using the feature's split function.

                             java.lang.Boolean value)
Set a manual feature in this segment.
